name: nest-cmdn-schematics
description: Opinionated NestJS Schematics. Uses Prisma, Zod validations, and REST controllers.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && npm run copy:collection && npm run copy:schematics
scripts.copy:schematics: cpx 'src/schematics/**/files/**/*.*' dist/schematics && cpx 'src/schematics/**/files/**/.*' dist/schematics && cpx 'src/schematics/**/files/**/.*/**' dist/schematics
scripts.test: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=test jest -w 1 --no-cache --config jest.json

author: CMDN
